errors.only_for_party_members: This command is only available for members of my party.
errors.only_for_private_messages: This command is only available in private messages.

config.description: Shows all the cosmetics of the game, an optional filter can be added and you can stop with the "stop" command.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: The filter to be set by showing the items.

random_order.name: Random order
random_order.description: Use a random order instead of ordering by newest first.

msg.items_already_displaying: Cosmetics are already being displayed, it must first be stopped with the "stop" command.
msg.items_showed: I have finished showing all the items...

query.name: Backpack name or ID

config.description: Sets the backpack's variants.

msg.variants_not_founded: This backpack does not have variants!

color.description: The name or ID of the color to set.

config.description: Shows the latest cosmetics added to the game, an optional filter can be added and you can stop with the "stop" command.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: The filter to be set by showing the items.

random_order.name: Random order
random_order.description: Use a random order instead of ordering by newest first.

msg.type_error: If you want an filter, make sure is valid, only outfits, backpacks, emojis, emotes, pickaxes or shoes.

msg.already_showing: Cosmetics are already being displayed, it must first be stopped with the "stop" command.
msg.showing_cosmetics: Setting all the recently added items... {{filter}}
msg.ended: Finished showing all recently added items...

config.description: Shows the cosmetics from the item shop, an optional filter can be added and you can stop with the "stop" command.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: The filter to be set by showing the items.

random_order.name: Random order
random_order.description: Use a random order instead of ordering by newest first.

msg.already_displaying: Cosmetics are already being displayed, it must first be stopped with the "stop" command.
msg.showing_items: Setting all the items in the shop... {{filter}}
msg.ended: I have finished showing all the items in the store...
